熬.definition: to cook on a slow fire; to extract by heating; to decoct; to endure

熬出頭.definition: to break clear of all the troubles and hardships; to achieve success; to make it

熬夜.definition: to stay up late or all night

熬更守夜.definition: to stay up through the night (idiom)

熬頭兒.definition: (coll.) the reward of one's efforts; the light at the end of the tunnel
